posts.title: Announcing TEDx Jahangirnagar University 2025
posts.excerpt: We’re bringing TEDx back to Jahangirnagar University with a day of ideas, connection, and inspiration.
posts.author: TEDx JU Team
content: TEDx Jahangirnagar University is an independently organized TED event created by a team of JU volunteers. Our mission is to spotlight bold, original ideas from Bangladesh and beyond.

The 2025 edition will feature live talks, performances, and conversations that spark curiosity and action. Whether you’re a student, alumnus, researcher, or creator — there’s a place for your ideas at TEDx JU.
Follow our channels for speaker announcements, theme reveal, and registration details. See you on campus!

posts.title: Speaker Spotlight: Voices Shaping Tomorrow
posts.excerpt: A first look at the kinds of voices and stories we’re curating for TEDx JU 2025.
posts.author: Curations Team
content: From science and social innovation to culture and creative arts, TEDx JU brings together a wide range of perspectives.
Our curation focuses on ideas with clarity, novelty, and relevance to our community.
Stay tuned for speaker reveals and stories behind the talks.

posts.title: Behind the Scenes: Building TEDx JU
posts.excerpt: How our all‑volunteer team turns an idea into a full TEDx experience.
posts.author: Organizing Team
content: Months of planning go into venue design, storytelling, partnerships, and technology.
Every detail — from stage lighting to on‑site experience — is crafted to elevate ideas worth spreading.
If you love building experiences, consider volunteering with us.

posts.title: Our Community, Our Stories
posts.excerpt: Why TEDx matters at Jahangirnagar University and beyond.
posts.author: Community Team
content: TEDx JU is where students, faculty, alumni, and neighbors meet to explore ideas that move us forward.
It’s more than an event — it’s a platform for meaningful dialogue and collaboration.
Bring your curiosity, and invite a friend.

posts.title: How to Prepare for a TEDx Talk
posts.excerpt: Practical tips for framing, refining, and delivering your idea worth spreading.
posts.author: Speaker Coaching
content: Start with a single, clear idea. Focus your story around why it matters now.
Use concrete examples, avoid jargon, and practice with honest feedback.
Rehearse for timing and attention — simplicity is powerful.
